title: Renewed Consumer Confidence Key to Housing Market Recovery
description: TORONTO, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Greater Toronto Area (GTA) home sales, new listings, and average selling price were down compared to a year earlier in November 2024. Intending homebuyers remained on the sidelines awaiting more positive economic news…
